definitions.definition: Honour, admiration, or distinction, accorded by common consent to a person or thing; high reputation; renown.
That quality in a person or thing which secures general praise or honour .

An optical phenomenon , consisting of concentric rings and somewhat similar to a rainbow , caused by sunlight or moonlight interacting with the water droplets that compose mist or clouds , centered on the antisolar or antilunar point.
An emanation of light supposed to shine from beings that are specially holy . It is represented in art by rays of gold, or the like, proceeding from the head or body, or by a disk, or a mere line.
The manifestation of the presence of God as perceived by humans in Abrahamic religions.

secondary_definitions: Honour, admiration, or distinction, accorded by common consent to a person or thing; high reputation; renown.
That quality in a person or thing which secures general praise or honour .

( meteorology , optics ) An optical phenomenon , consisting of concentric rings and somewhat similar to a rainbow , caused by sunlight or moonlight interacting with the water droplets that compose mist or clouds , centered on the antisolar or antilunar point.
An emanation of light supposed to shine from beings that are specially holy . It is represented in art by rays of gold, or the like, proceeding from the head or body, or by a disk, or a mere line.
( theology ) The manifestation of the presence of God as perceived by humans in Abrahamic religions.
